name: 'Queer As Folk' : Brian Quiz | Queer As Folk | 15 Questions

questions.text: What is Brian's affectionate nickname for Michael?
questions.explanation:
Mikey.

	Brian and Mikey have been best friends since they were fourteen. Michael is the only person, aside from Lindsay and Gus, that Brian would truly do anything for.

questions.text: What song did Brian and Justin dance to on the ill-fated night of Justin's prom?
questions.correct: The Drifters' 'Save The Last Dance For Me'
options: Elvis Presley's 'I Can't Help Falling In Love With You'
questions.explanation:
The Drifters' 'Save The Last Dance For Me'.

	Although I am a fan of the Brian-Michael pairing, I must admit that it was a very sweet dance.

questions.text: What was the reason for Brian and Michael's biggest fight in season 1?
questions.correct: Brian outed Michael to his co-worker
options: Michael outed Brian to his co-worker
Brian stood Michael up to be with Justin
questions.explanation:
Brian outed Michael to his co-worker.

	Michael's mom thought Brian was a bad influence on her son, so she asked him to push Michael away for his own good. Brian, always the dramatist, did it with a bang. He threw Michael a giant 30th birthday party and outed him to his co-worker Tracy. This caused a problem for a time, but soon Michael forgave Brian. After all, nothing can keep these two apart.

questions.text: Who named Brian executor of his living will?
questions.explanation:
Ted & Ted Schmidt.

	Ted figured that since Brian didn't really like him, he'd be impartial and be able to do the right thing.

questions.text: What is the name of Brian's son?
What did Brian's dad always call him?
questions.explanation:
Sonny boy.

	Brian and his father had a rocky relationship, but even so, Brian continues to call his son Gus 'sonny boy'.

questions.text: To whom did Brian say this to: 'There's only two kinds of straight people in this world; the ones that hate you to your face, and the ones that hate you behind your back.'?
questions.explanation:
Michael & Mikey & Michael Novotny.

	Oh, Brian, that's not true! Brian said this to Mikey right before dropping him off to have a drink with his straight co-workers.

questions.text: Who sued Brian for sexual harassment?
questions.explanation:
Kip.

	Kip and Brian had a fling, and then Kip asked Brian for a promotion. When Brian said no because he didn't feel that Kip was ready, Kip sued him.

questions.correct: A leather and cowry shell bracelet
options: A gold ring from his grandfather
questions.explanation:
A leather and cowry shell bracelet.

	What is the significance of this mysterious bracelet that Brian is never seen without? Maybe we'll never know.

questions.text: Who hit Brian with his car?
questions.correct: Craig Taylor & Craig & Justin's father & Justin's dad
questions.explanation:
Craig Taylor & Craig & Justin's father & Justin's dad.

	When Justin's father Craig found out that Justin was gay and involved with Brian, he wanted revenge.

questions.text: What kind of car did Brian drive in seasons 1 and 2?
What does Brian do for a living?
questions.explanation:
Ad executive.

	How else could he afford that beautiful loft and those designer clothes?

questions.text: Out of these four people, who does Brian NOT dislike?
questions.explanation:
Debbie.

	Debbie is like Brian's surrogate mother. He never had a good family life, and Mikey's family adopted him as one of their own.

questions.text: At the beginning of Season 2, what do we discover Brian has had with him all the time since Justin's accident?
questions.correct: The white scarf he was wearing that he used to wrap Justin's head
questions.explanation:
The white scarf he was wearing that he used to wrap Justin's head.

	It was caked up in Justin's dried blood. Sweet, I guess, but also kind of eerie if you ask me.

questions.text: Where was Brian considering moving to at the end of season one?
questions.correct: New York & New York City & NYC
questions.explanation: New York & New York City & NYC.
